name: Backpack! School Checklist
description: Its again the back-to-school time and soon our kids will start another year of learning science and exploring life!  For all parents we prepared a comprehensive list of supplies required for school.  The Backpack application has four lists, each containing its own set of supplies for: - Kindergarten - Elementary School - Middle School - High School  Download the Backpack app, find out what you forgot to buy and add your custom items to the list.  Pack the backpack and get ready for school!
